trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Eaton
There were no other sightings in Eaton on or around June 15th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsmy girlfriend and i were sitting outside in front of our house which faces south. we were listening to the music event that was taking place about three blocks from us. saw a glowing blue ball of light in the sky comming in from the southwest. thought at first it was a plane flying to low and fast but it had no red plane lights or plane headlights just a glowing blue sphere comming right in my direction. it wasn't very high but it was above treetop level it seemed to be moving at a road speed of 4o-45mph. it travelled in a smooth straight path over my house and continued onward into the northeast. we watched it untill went out of sight. we were more amused than amazed. i text some friends about it.
Summary: glowing electric blue sphere of light size of basket ball travelling in a smooth straight path from the southwest going northeast
